the skill name instead of "Back"

minor fixes and add timer to quest log to refresh every 30 seconds
fixed the menu bug by doing ugly things
fix back button in skill categories page
add a little border on the bottom

add encyclopedia item detail fragment with links to other things in the
tips and warnings
added item categories and items in categories screens
move achievements back to the sidebar

change notification on message receive to not use notification builder
because some versions of android does not support it.

possibly fix a couple of crashes

possibly fixed two crashes users have experienced according to the logs.
1. trying to show the progress bar if on one of the skill fragments when
it hasnt been created yet.
2. trying to register a device that they received a key for and somehow
they have no glitch auth token. it retries every once in a while until
they get one.

on the forums

people liked a post
